author: asianlego
title: Useful while travelling.
review: Before the existence of X-Pods playing Legos in the RV means you have to get one of these. The play desk has two compartments on each side and the compartments are covered with two 16x32 light green baseplate. If you slide both baseplates to the middle it joins to create a 32x32 baseplate and also lets you reach the bricks in the compartments. There are many uncommon bricks inside but mostly they are just plain Lego bricks. There is only one minifig which is a boy with a freckled face sporting a Freestyle torso.
